item.title: 华平投资集团将以超过 7 亿欧元的价格收购德国 PSI 公司
item.description: 私募股权公司华平投资（Warburg Pincus）周一表示，计划以超过 7 亿欧元（8.1326 亿美元）的价格收购德国软件公司 PSI Software。【原文：Private equity firm Warburg Pincus plans to buy German software firm PSI Software for more than 700 million euros ($813.26 million), the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国 9 月进出口超预期
item.description: 由于与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税协议仍遥遥无期，而投资者又在努力应对双方贸易战中的最新炮火，制造商们在美国以外的市场找到了买家，这推动了中国 9 月份的出口增长。【原文：China's export growth picked up pace in September, buoyed by manufacturers finding buyers in markets beyond the U.S. as a tariff deal with President Donald Trump remained elusive while investors grappled with the latest salvoes in their trade war.】

item.title: 谷歌称澳大利亚关于青少年使用社交媒体的法律 "极难 "执行
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌（Google）周一表示，澳大利亚要执行禁止 16 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体的法律 "极其困难"，并警告说政府的举措不会使儿童上网更安全。【原文：Alphabet-owned Google on Monday said it would be "extremely difficult" for Australia to enforce a law prohibiting people younger than 16 from using social media, warning that the government's initiative would not make children safer online.】

item.title: 美国制裁后，联合石化将超级油轮调离山东港口
item.description: LSEG的数据显示，美国周五对中国山东日照港的一个进口码头实施制裁后，一艘向该港运送石油的超级油轮在周末改变了目的地。【原文：A supertanker carrying oil to the Chinese port of Rizhao in Shandong province changed its destination from there over the weekend after the U.S. imposed sanctions on an import terminal at the port on Friday, LSEG data shows.】

item.title: 杰富瑞认为 First Brands 破产影响有限
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）周日表示，该公司对破产汽车零部件制造商 First Brands Group 的风险敞口有限，任何潜在损失都 "可随时吸收"。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group said on Sunday its exposure to bankrupt auto parts maker First Brands Group is limited and any potential losses will be "readily absorbable".】

item.title: 中国汽车销量在 "金九月 "加速增长
item.description: 9 月份是中国汽车市场的传统旺季，由于经销商和消费者在更多地方政府暂停汽车以旧换新补贴政策之前利用了这一政策，中国的汽车销量加速增长。【原文：China's car sales accelerated in September, the traditional peak season for the auto market, as dealers and consumers took advantage of trade-in subsidies before more local governments suspended the incentives.】

item.title: 市场关注中美贸易紧张局势和政治，美元保持稳定
item.description: 美元从周一早盘的大跌中回升，原因是投资者希望华盛顿能缓和其与中国政府贸易战的最新升级，而法国和日本的政治事态发展则削弱了欧元和日元的走势。【原文：The U.S. dollar recovered from a selloff in early trade on Monday as investors hoped Washington may temper its latest escalation of the trade war with Beijing, while political developments in France and Japan undermined the euro and the yen.】

item.title: 中美紧张局势导致油价大幅下跌后反弹 1
item.description: 油价在上一交易日触及五个月低点后，周一回吐了一些涨幅，因为投资者希望中美两国总统可能举行的会谈能够缓解世界上最大的两个经济体和石油消费国之间的贸易紧张局势。【原文：Oil prices clawed back some gains on Monday after hitting five-month lows in the previous session as investors hoped potential talks between the presidents of the U.S. and China could ease trade tensions between the world's two largest economies and oil consumers.】

item.title: 美国贸易战再起将使中国股市从高位回落
item.description: 中国股市周一将承压，因为华盛顿和中国政府之间重启的贸易战打击了风险偏好，并刺激获利回吐，股市徘徊在十年来的最高水平附近。【原文：China stocks are set to come under pressure on Monday as the renewed trade war between Washington and Beijing hits risk appetite and spurs profit-taking in a share market hovering near its highest level in a decade.】

item.title: LG 能源解决方案公司称第三季度营业利润可能增长 34
item.description: 特斯拉（Tesla）和通用汽车（General Motors）的电动汽车电池供应商 LG Energy Solution 周一表示，其第三季度营业利润可能同比增长 34%，达到 6010 亿韩元（约合 4.2 亿美元）。【原文：LG Energy Solution , an electric car battery supplier for Tesla and General Motors , said on Monday its third-quarter operating profit likely rose 34% to 601 billion won ($420 million) from a year earlier.】

item.title: 风险情绪稳定，华尔街期货反弹，亚洲仍不稳定
item.description: 尽管有迹象表明风险情绪已经稳定，华尔街期货反弹，但在中美贸易战的新一轮冲击下，亚洲股市周一的开局注定坎坷。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a rocky start on Monday after fresh broadsides in the U.S. China trade war spooked markets with already stretched valuations, though there were signs risk sentiment had steadied with Wall St futures bouncing.】

item.title: 中国餐饮企业蜂拥新加坡，迈出扩张第一步
item.description: 过去一年里，创纪录数量的中餐馆和咖啡馆涌入新加坡，它们将新加坡作为全球扩张的试验田，以躲避国内疲软的消费需求、激烈的价格竞争和超低的利润率。【原文：A record number of Chinese restaurants and cafes have flooded Singapore over the past year, using the island as a test bed for global expansion as they escape pallid consumer demand, extreme price competition and super-squeezed profit margins back home.】

item.title: 人工智能需求拉动芯片价格上涨，三星第三季度利润创三年来新高
item.description: 分析师的估计显示，三星电子第三季度利润有望达到自 2022 年以来的最高水平，原因是客户重建库存，服务器需求支撑内存芯片价格上涨。【原文：Samsung Electronics is expected to post its highest third-quarter profit since 2022, driven by higher memory chip prices supported by server demand as customers rebuild inventories, analysts' estimates showed.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行将停止约 5.2 亿美元的剩余回购计划
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）将停止剩余的 8 亿澳元（约合 5.2 亿美元）股票回购，因为新上任的首席执行官努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）正着手保留更多现金，并将重点转向大胆重启银行的增长战略。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group will stop the remaining A$800 million ($520 million) of its share buyback, as newly appointed CEO Nuno Matos moves to preserve more cash and shifts focus to a bold reset of the bank’s growth strategy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国库葡萄酒公司暂停 1.3 亿美元回购，撤回 2026 年盈利预测
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部葡萄酒公司（Treasury Wine Estates）周一表示，由于其在中国的旗舰企业奔富（Penfolds）以及财政部美洲公司（Treasury Americas）的业务前景不明朗，该公司将暂停8月份宣布的2亿澳元（约合1.3002亿美元）股票回购计划，并将不再维持2026财年的EBITS增长指导。【原文：Australia's Treasury Wine Estates said on Monday it is pausing its A$200 million ($130.02 million) share buyback announced in August and will not be retaining its guidance for EBITS growth in fiscal year 2026, owing to the uncertain outlook in its flagship Penfolds business in China as well as its Treasury Americas portfolios.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒将以 7.28 亿美元收购澳大利亚 RPMGlobal 公司
item.description: 澳大利亚采矿软件公司 RPMGlobal 周一表示，该公司已与重型机械巨头卡特彼勒达成收购协议，股权总价值为 11.2 亿澳元（7.2822 亿美元）。【原文：Australian mining software firm RPMGlobal said on Monday that it has struck a deal to be acquired by heavy machinery giant Caterpillar for a total equity value of A$1.12 billion ($728.22 million).】

item.title: 荷兰政府干预中资计算机芯片公司 Nexperia
item.description: 荷兰政府周日晚些时候表示，由于担心关键技术可能被转移到荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 的母公司中国闻泰，政府正在对该公司进行干预。【原文：The Dutch government said late on Sunday it is intervening at Dutch chipmaker Nexperia, which manufactures computer chips for the car and consumer electronics industries, due to worries about the possible transfer of crucial technology to the company's parent company, Wingtech of China.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表称中国 "推迟 "美方扩大出口管制后的电话联系
item.description: 贸易代表杰米森-格里尔（Jamison Greer）周日表示，在中国宣布扩大稀土出口管制后，美国曾主动与中国通电话，但中国政府拒绝了，而中国则指责美国实行所谓的 "双重标准"。【原文：Trade Representative Jamison Greer said on Sunday that the U.S. reached out to China for a phone call following an announcement that it was expanding its rare earths export controls but Beijing deferred, while China accused the U.S. of what it called "double standards."】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，华平接近达成以超过 7 亿欧元收购德国 PSI 公司的协议
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，私募股权公司华平投资（Warburg Pincus）即将达成收购德国软件制造商 PSI Software 的交易，交易价值超过 7 亿欧元（8.13 亿美元）。【原文：Private equity firm Warburg Pincus is nearing a deal to buy German software maker PSI Software in a deal worth more than 700 million euros ($813 million), two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：自 2022 年以来，现代汽车佐治亚州工厂有三名工人在美国移民突袭前死亡
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引一份联邦记录审查报告报道，自现代汽车公司于 2022 年在佐治亚州开始建设其价值 76 亿美元的汽车厂以来，已有三名工人死亡。【原文：Three workers have died since Hyundai Motor started construction of its $7.6 billion auto plant in Georgia in 2022, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing a review of federal records.】

item.title: 宴会和数十亿美元：阿斯利康如何与特朗普达成美国医药交易
item.description: 周五，阿斯利康公司首席执行官帕斯卡尔-索里奥（Pascal Soriot）站在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的椭圆形办公室里，神情轻松地公布了一项医药协议，该协议将为数百万美国人降低药品价格。【原文：AstraZeneca CEO Pascal Soriot looked relaxed standing in the Oval Office on Friday as U.S. President Donald Trump unveiled a medicine deal that will lower drug prices for millions of Americans.】

item.title: 中国称高通承认收购 Autotalks 未告知监管机构
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周日表示，美国半导体制造商高通公司（Qualcomm）承认，它在今年 6 月完成对以色列 Autotalks 公司的收购时没有通知中国当局。【原文：U.S. semiconductor manufacturer Qualcomm admitted that it had not informed Chinese authorities when it completed its acquisition of Israel's Autotalks in June, China's market regulator said on Sunday.】

item.title: 台湾称不需要中国大陆满足其大部分稀土需求
item.description: 台湾经济部周日表示，台湾使用的大部分稀土材料由欧洲、美国和日本供应，但中国新的限制措施对半导体行业的影响仍需评估。【原文：Most rare earth materials used in Taiwan are supplied by Europe, the United States and Japan, but the impact of China's new curbs on the semiconductor industry still needs to be assessed, the island's economy ministry said on Sunday.】

item.title: 澳航称网络犯罪分子在网络漏洞发生数月后公布了客户数据
item.description: 7 月份的入侵事件是澳大利亚最受瞩目的网络攻击事件。【原文：The July breach represented Australia's most high-profile cyberattack.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华纳兄弟拒绝了派拉蒙的收购请求
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六报道，华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司拒绝了派拉蒙 Skydance 公司最初的收购提议，认为其收购价格过低。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery has rebuffed Paramount Skydance's initial takeover approach as too low, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国称稀土出口管制 "合法
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对中国商品征收新的高额关税以报复稀土出口管制措施之后，中国周日为其 "合法 "的稀土出口管制措施进行了辩护。【原文：China defended its export control measures on rare earths as "legitimate" on Sunday after President Donald Trump retaliated against the curbs by announcing steep new U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，"思维机器实验室 "联合创始人图洛奇离职，转投 Meta 公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周六报道，米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）的 "思维机器实验室"（Thinking Machines Lab）的联合创始人安德鲁-图鲁克（Andrew Tulloch）已离开该公司，加入 Meta Platforms。【原文：Andrew Tulloch, the co-founder of Mira Murati's Thinking Machines Lab, has left the company to join Meta Platforms, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 德国部长称欧盟需要 "数字主权 "并不意味着保护主义
item.description: 德国数字部长卡斯滕-维尔德伯格（Karsten Wildberger）告诉路透社记者，欧洲需要建立自己的数字基础设施，以减少对美国供应商的依赖，但这并不意味着完全放弃美国供应商。【原文：Europe needs to build up its own digital infrastructure to reduce dependence on U.S. providers, but that does not mean turning away from them completely, Germany's digital minister Karsten Wildberger told Reuters.】

item.title: 印度莫迪会见高通公司首席执行官，讨论人工智能和创新问题
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）会见了高通公司总裁兼首席执行官克里斯蒂安诺-阿蒙（Cristiano Amon），莫迪办公室在周六的一份声明中说。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi met Cristiano Amon, President and CEO of Qualcomm , Modi's office said in a statement on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国放宽对外国造船的部分处罚，同时加强其他处罚
item.description: 美国贸易代表办公室周五表示，将在与中国有关的船舶港口费下周生效之前，修改针对外国建造的汽车运输船和液化天然气船的某些海事相关费用。【原文：The United States Trade Representative's office said on Friday it would modify certain maritime-related fees for foreign-built vehicle carriers and liquefied natural gas vessels ahead of port fees on China-linked ships slated to go into effect next week.】
